segments.text: I notice the water overflowing from the sink in a steady stream.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's spilling onto the floor, making everything slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so absorbed in polishing that plate she misses it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her one foot is already wet, she could slip any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now those children climbing for cookies, that's dangerous too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stool is tilting back, he might fall hard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he drops those cookies or the plate, it'll shatter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaching up could get knocked over in the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damage everywhere, cabinets soaking through.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope no one gets hurt in this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks safe and calm, what a contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could turn into a real accident so quickly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone has to intervene before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My heart's racing just watching this unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR
